thread.title: Risk Theory Names Tschippert Senior VP
thread.title_full: Risk Theory Names Tschippert Senior VP - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Risk Theory Names Tschippert Senior VP
text:
Risk Theory, LLC
DALLAS , Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Risk Theory, LLC a leading distribution and program management firm for Property and Casualty Insurance is pleased to announce the addition of Bob Tschippert , CPCU as Senior Vice President of Dealer Services.
Bob has over 31 years of experience managing sales, claims and underwriting units specializing in the automotive and automotive aftermarket industry. Bob graduated from Duquesne University in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania and received his CPCU designation in 1995. His background includes 27 years with Zurich (Universal Underwriters). He was most recently the National Managing Director for Ally Financial Services where he was responsible for the garage insurance program. He has extensive experience with large complex accounts which utilized alternative risk financing programs such as retrospective rating plans, large deductible plans and captives. Bob will be responsible for developing automotive related products for Risk Theory, LLC.
"Bob is a great addition to our leadership team. With his background and experience, he brings broad capabilities for his role in developing and distributing additional products for our programs," said Bryan Wilburn , CEO of Risk Theory, LLC.
For more information about Risk Theory's automotive programs, contact Tschippert directly at (469) 310-9140 or at btschippert@risktheory.com .
